standard_coverages.description: Covers property damage or injuries you may cause to others, including damages to other people's cars or property
Covers injuries you and passengers may suffer in an accident

exclusions.description: Does not cover damage to your own vehicle
Excludes accidents off designated roads unless add-on purchased
Excludes damage caused intentionally by the insured
No coverage if driving under alcohol or drugs
Excludes claims if driver is unlicensed

standard_coverages.description: Covers damages to other people's cars or property
Covers injuries to you and passengers in an accident
Covers damages your car sustains in an accident, including from events beyond your control

optional_add_ons.description: Assistance if your car breaks down on the road
Compensation if injured in an accident
High-quality repairs at your car dealership
Replacement vehicle while your car is in repairs
Coverage against natural disasters and vandalism
Covers accidents caused by unknown drivers
Covers accidents on all terrain, including sand dunes
Extends coverage to UAE, Kuwait, and Oman
Replacement of worn-out parts at no extra cost

exclusions.description: Excludes damage caused intentionally by the insured
No coverage if driving under alcohol or drugs
Excludes claims if driver is unlicensed

standard_coverages.description: Covers accident and acute medical emergencies, including in-patient, out-patient, pharmacy, doctor visits, tests, and treatments within Qatar
Provides compensation for covered events and treatments in Qatar

standard_coverages.limit: Hotel quarantine up to QAR 300/day for 10 days; One rapid Antigen Test on day 6
standard_coverages.description: Covers COVID-19 related quarantine, treatment, and testing if home quarantine is not possible

standard_coverages.limit: QAR 35,000 sublimit for ambulance and evacuation
standard_coverages.description: Covers emergency evacuation and repatriation for medical emergencies

exclusions.description: Excludes treatment for pre-existing medical conditions
No coverage for routine check-ups, elective procedures, or chronic conditions
Excludes injuries from war, terrorism, or civil unrest

standard_coverages.description: Covers broken bones, limb losses, dislocations, or burns from accidents
Covers assistance for mobility and well-being recovery after accident
Compensation for death due to unexpected occasions or severe injuries in the accident
Compensation when permanent disability is caused by the accident
Covers treatment and care during hospitalization due to accident

exclusions.description: No compensation for death or injury arising from pre-existing conditions
Excludes intentional self-harm or suicide attempts
No coverage if accident occurs during illegal activities

standard_coverages.description: Covers loss or damage to contents caused by fire, theft, etc., including furniture, mirrors, valuables like jewelry, pictures, fine art; excludes deeds, bonds, bills of exchange

standard_coverages.limit: 15% of the total Sum Insured on Contents
standard_coverages.description: Covers temporary housing if home is uninhabitable due to covered peril
Covers damage to home's walls, roof, or structure for owners
Covers damage to landlord's items
Covers loss or damage to visitors' belongings
Covers broken mirrors (excludes hand mirrors)
Covers servant's or driver's belongings within specified locations
Protects against disasters: fire, theft, riot, earthquake, hurricanes, floods
Covers contents while temporarily removed from home
Covers liability to landlord as a private householder

optional_add_ons.limit: Maximum of 3 emergencies per year per policy
optional_add_ons.description: Emergency repairs for safety or to prevent further damage; not a maintenance contract
Protects against death or disability; can cover you, family, or household workers
Guards items from damage caused by visitors or pets

exclusions.description: Excludes normal wear, gradual deterioration
Limited coverage if home unoccupied for extended periods
Excludes valuables exceeding specified sub-limits unless declared

standard_coverages.description: Covers damages you may accidentally cause to other people's property or injuries caused by your boat

exclusions.description: Does not cover damage to your own boat
Excludes ship's boat with speed over 17 knots unless endorsed

standard_coverages.item: Loss or Damage to the Boat
standard_coverages.description: Covers against fire, piracy, lightning, theft, accidental damage, events beyond your control
Covers damages to other people's property
Covers injuries, death, or disability in case of severe events
Guards your personal items on board
Towing to nearest repair place when needed
Covers if your boat was damaged during transport to the anchorage

optional_add_ons.description: Covers injury or damage that may occur while towing a skier by the insured watercraft

exclusions.description: Excludes gradual deterioration, corrosion
No coverage if boat not seaworthy
Excludes damage during racing unless endorsed

standard_coverages.description: Protects business assets against damage from fire, theft, natural disasters
Covers liability for injury or damage to third parties
Covers loss of income due to covered perils

optional_add_ons.description: Covers data breaches and cyber attacks

exclusions.description: Excludes damage from intentional or criminal acts
No coverage for war, terrorism unless added
Excludes gradual pollution or environmental damage

standard_coverages.description: Covers injury or property damage caused while playing golf
Provides compensation for accidental injury while playing golf, including death and permanent disability
Covers repair or replacement of lost, stolen, or damaged golf equipment and clothing
Reimburses club fees if a golf accident prevents you from playing golf for over 60 days
Covers emergency hospitalization costs resulting from a golf-related accident, starting after the first 24 hours
Covers emergency dental treatment for injuries caused by a direct blow while playing golf
Reimburses hire costs for replacement golf equipment if yours is lost during overseas travel
Reimburses tournament fees if you must cancel due to unexpected illness or injury within 14 days of the event
Covers celebration expenses if you score a Hole-in-One in an official club competition (for adults over 21 only)

exclusions.limit: QAR 150 per claim; QAR 500 for GPS/range finders
exclusions.description: Deductible amount for each claim
Excludes professional golfers or those earning from golf
No coverage for theft of unattended equipment
Only available to Qatar residents aged between 5 and 70 years old (unless otherwise agreed)
